mods.note: ACTION AT CHINARINAZ (10th May 1918) FOR OFFICIAL USE ONLY. ? D. 0. No. 2423, November 1918. GENERAL STAFF INDIA.

location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed on paperDimensions: 292 x 200mm, on sheet 335 x 215mm

mods.abstract: The scale of the map is 1inch = 1mile.The map was printed by the Simla Drawing Office and includes the printing statement ‘S. D. O. No. 2423, November 1918’.
